blogPost.excerpt: Pod Stack is an easy-to-use Notion template that helps you create & manage your podcast. You'll find hundreds of prebuilt components, tools, and resources. From episode preparation to monetization, we have you covered. Get $5 off with "producthunt"!
blogPost.body: Pod Stack is an easy-to-use Notion template that helps you create & manage your podcast. You'll find hundreds of prebuilt components, tools, and resources. From episode preparation to monetization, we have you covered. Get $5 off with "producthunt"!
blogPost.title: Pod Stack - Create & manage your podcast with this Notion template.
blogPost.author: Tem Nugmanov

localize.description: Pod Stack是一个易于使用的Notion模板，可以帮助你创建和管理你的播客。你会发现数以百计的预制组件、工具和资源。从剧集准备到货币化，我们为您提供服务。使用 "producthunt "可获得5美元优惠!
localize.tagline: 用这个Notion模板创建和管理你的播客。

localize.description: Pod Stack是一個易於使用的Notion模板，可以幫助你創建和管理你的播客。你會發現數以百計的預製組件、工具和資源。從劇集準備到貨幣化，我們爲您提供服務。使用 "producthunt "可獲得5美元優惠!
localize.tagline: 用這個Notion模板創建和管理你的播客。

previous.excerpt: This newsletter is made with serious love. I've selected and partnered with some of the funniest indie comic artists in the world. This daily newsletter will put a smile on your face.
previous.title: The Funnies - The funniest web comics delivered to your inbox

localize.description: 这篇通讯是用严肃的爱做的。我选择了一些世界上最有趣的独立漫画家并与之合作。这份每日通讯会让你脸上露出笑容。
localize.tagline: 将最有趣的网络漫画发送到您的收件箱中

localize.description: 這篇通訊是用嚴肅的愛做的。我選擇了一些世界上最有趣的獨立漫畫家並與之合作。這份每日通訊會讓你臉上露出笑容。
localize.tagline: 將最有趣的網絡漫畫發送到您的收件箱中

next.excerpt: Post.co is the best way to share big and small news across your team. Designed as a substitute for messy threads and awkward reply-all team emails, Post is a simple, low-stakes way to share team-wide updates. Great for remote teams to stay connected.
next.title: Post - The simplest way to post big or small news across your team.

localize.description: Post.co是在您的团队中分享大小新闻的最佳方式。Post.co是一种简单的、低风险的分享团队更新的方式，它的设计可以替代混乱的线程和尴尬的团队邮件回复。非常适合远程团队保持联系。
localize.tagline: 最简单的方式在你的团队中发布大大小小的新闻。

localize.description: Post.co是在您的團隊中分享大小新聞的最佳方式。Post.co是一種簡單的、低風險的分享團隊更新的方式，它的設計可以替代混亂的線程和尷尬的團隊郵件回覆。非常適合遠程團隊保持聯繫。
localize.tagline: 最簡單的方式在你的團隊中發佈大大小小的新聞。
